description: Parse the Python file and extract IR (imports, class name, endpoints, metadata).
Create the symbolic scaffold with placeholders for imports, metadata, class header, init, and endpoints.
Replace the {{IMPORTS}} placeholder with the inferred import block.
Replace the {{METADATA}} placeholder with the @service_metadata block.
Replace the {{CLASS_HEADER}} placeholder with the class declaration and inheritance.
Replace the {{INIT}} placeholder with the __init__ method including super().__init__.
Replace the {{ENDPOINTS}} placeholder with all endpoint methods, each with correct decorators.
Remove any remaining placeholders and normalize whitespace.
